question: Which bank launched a cyber-fraud awareness campaign named 'Mooh Band Rakho'?
explanation:
Indiaâ€™s Leading private sector bank HDFC Bank has recently announced the launch of "Mooh Band Rakho," campaign.
The campaign aims to increase awareness on cyber frauds and the bank will conduct as many as 1000 workshops across the country in the next four months. It also supports the International Fraud Awareness Week 2020, which is being held from November 15 - 21.
